languages.text: "Это больше говорит о тебе, чем обо мне, Вольный Торговец. Мое величайшее преступление в прошлом, твоему же, судя по всему, еще предстоит свершиться".

traits.locale_text: "Это больше говорит о тебе, чем обо мне, Вольный Торговец. Мое величайшее преступление в прошлом, твоему же, судя по всему, еще предстоит свершиться".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."
languages.original_text: "Это больше говорит о тебе, чем обо мне, Вольный Торговец. Мое величайшее преступление в прошлом, твоему же, судя по всему, еще предстоит свершиться".

traits.locale_text: "This says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now; yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "This says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now; yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."

traits.locale_text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: “这似乎更像是在说你自己，而不是在说我，行商浪人。我最可怕的罪行已经成为过去，而你最大的罪行似乎还没有犯下。”
languages.original_text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."

traits.locale_text: “这似乎更像是在说你自己，而不是在说我，行商浪人。我最可怕的罪行已经成为过去，而你最大的罪行似乎还没有犯下。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: 「それは私というよりお前の事ではないか、自由開拓者。私の最も大きな罪は過去にある。お前の罪はどうやら、これから犯すことになるようだな」
languages.original_text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."

traits.locale_text: 「それは私というよりお前の事ではないか、自由開拓者。私の最も大きな罪は過去にある。お前の罪はどうやら、これから犯すことになるようだな」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: «Esto dice más de usted que de mí, Comerciante Independiente. Mi mayor crimen ya es pasado; al parecer el suyo está aún por cometerse».
languages.original_text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."

traits.locale_text: «Esto dice más de usted que de mí, Comerciante Independiente. Mi mayor crimen ya es pasado; al parecer el suyo está aún por cometerse».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Das sagt mehr über Euch aus denn über mich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein größtes Verbrechen liegt jetzt in der Vergangenheit. Eures, wie mir scheint, ist noch nicht begangen."
languages.original_text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."

traits.locale_text: "Das sagt mehr über Euch aus denn über mich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein größtes Verbrechen liegt jetzt in der Vergangenheit. Eures, wie mir scheint, ist noch nicht begangen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: « Vos paroles en disent plus long sur vous que sur moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mes crimes, aussi épouvantables soient-ils, appartiennent au passé, alors qu'il semblerait que les vôtres soient encore à venir. »
languages.original_text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."

traits.locale_text: « Vos paroles en disent plus long sur vous que sur moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mes crimes, aussi épouvantables soient-ils, appartiennent au passé, alors qu'il semblerait que les vôtres soient encore à venir. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: "Bu söylediğin benden çok sana ayna tutuyor Hür Tacir. Benim işlediğim en büyük suç geçmişte kaldı, seninki ise görünen o ki henüz işlenmemiş."
languages.original_text: "That says more about you than it does about me, Rogue Trader. My greatest crime is in the past now — yours, it appears, is yet to be committed."

traits.locale_text: "Bu söylediğin benden çok sana ayna tutuyor Hür Tacir. Benim işlediğim en büyük suç geçmişte kaldı, seninki ise görünen o ki henüz işlenmemiş."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
